data.description_html:
Prerequisite: evil alignment

You cloak yourself in a black, terrible aura of contempt and spite.

You must make a charge attack as part of this maneuver. If your target is good-aligned, your attack deals an extra 6d6 points of damage. In addition, if your charge attack hits and the target is good-aligned, you become wreathed in unholy energy. You gain damage reduction 10/? until the beginning of your next turn.
data.name: Doom Charge
data.rulebook: Tome of Battle: The Book of Nine Swords
